title: Bug 49235: ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? classSet is not correctly handling the expected classes
description: Bug 49235: ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? classSet is not correctly handling the expected classes. Currently, the output is "MySomeAnn", but it should be "MySomeClass". This issue is not yet addressed in the Servlet 3.0 specification. My code works fine on Glassfish 3.0.
OB: Currently, when running the code on Tomcat 7.0.0 built from SVN r939221, the output of the ServletContainerInitializer's onStartup method is "MySomeAnn".
EB: The expected behavior is that the output should be "MySomeClass".
